entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 32.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 03 February 2023
